projectGridLines.title: To work on building intelligence dashboard for managers and HR teams using AI
projectGridLines.description:
Role Overview:

As an AI & Data Analytics Intern, you’ll work closely with our HR and technology teams to design and develop an intelligent, interactive dashboard. This tool will utilize data analytics and AI algorithms to support decision-making, visualize workforce trends, and provide actionable insights for our managers and HR teams.

Key Responsibilities:

  1. Data Analysis & Preparation
  • Collaborate with HR, tech, and data teams to define project goals, gather requirements, and understand user needs.
  • Clean and process HR data from multiple sources
  • Perform exploratory data analysis
  • Build and optimize data models, ensuring data quality and relevance.
  • Create data pipelines for continuous processing
  1. Dashboard Development
  • Design intuitive user interfaces for data visualization
  • Implement interactive features and filters
  • Create automated reporting mechanisms
  1. AI/ML Implementation
  • Develop predictive models for HR metrics
  • Implement intelligent search and filtering
  • Create recommendation systems for HR actions
  1. Documentation & Testing
  • Write technical documentation
  • Create test cases and perform testing
  • Document code and maintain version control

 

Required Qualifications:

  • Solid understanding of data analytics, data visualization, and machine learning concepts.
  • Proficiency in programming languages (e.g., Python, SQL) and familiarity with tools like Power BI, Tableau, or similar dashboarding software.
  • Experience with machine learning libraries (e.g., scikit-learn, TensorFlow) and data handling libraries (e.g., Pandas, NumPy).
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and a proactive approach to learning and applying new technologies.

Nice-to-Have Skills:

  • Experience with HR data or knowledge of HR metrics is a plus.
  • Exposure to cloud platforms like Azure Datalake with Medallion architecture .

What You’ll Gain:

  • Real-world experience in applying AI and analytics to solve HR and management challenges.
  • Mentorship from industry experts and exposure to best practices in data analytics and AI.
  • An opportunity to showcase your work and gain hands-on experience in a rapidly growing field.
